description: This file defines a UI Fragment for displaying video details in an Android TV app, including title, description, and a play button. It manages user interactions like playing the video and handling back navigation.

classes.name: VideoDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays details of a Video object including title, description, and a play button, with handling for user actions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and retrieves the Video object from arguments.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up the UI components, binds data, and handles user input such as play button clicks and back key presses.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new fragment instance with a specific Video object.
